name: Being Friendly
description:
I think I'm suffering from an intimacy allergy.
Every time I'm around my best friend I often have shortness of breath, my heart is overworked. Sometimes I think it's falling in love But sometimes I think it might be normal for people to be friends.

But I'm always confused and began to be unable to distinguish
Friends can hold each other all the time, right?
Can friends tie shoelaces for each other?
Can friends kiss each other on the cheek?

and the thing that has always stuck in my mind Is that my friends hold me She hugged me tight because she couldn't stand it. She's drunk and keeps complaining about work. She looked at me with beautiful and alluring eyes. She praised me for being a savvy person, she said I was a magician who could disappear to her whenever she wanted, and she "loved" me.

if we are friends Can we say I love you?
It's a typical love confession. or just as a friend

Do we feel the same?

That day my heart beat faster than ever. I was nervous until I couldn't sleep. I took care of you who was drunk until you fell asleep. and when the morning comes She woke up with a hangover. She smiled at me even though she looked very weak. But I love that smile.
She thanked me and said a dream-shattering sentence. and my feelings

“Thank you, you are my best friend.”

You probably only see me as a friend.
If we're just friend don't play both end
